resources.string:
This Privacy Policy applies to Destination Alarm application. This application tracks the users current location and alerts the users when they are about to reach their destination. 
1) The application does not retrieve and store any personal and private information from the device and does not share information with any third parties. 
2)This application retrieves device location using gps and Network services and also uses an internet connection to load supporting resources. 
3)This application contains Advertisements in various forms using Google Admob services.
Move the marker to the Desired location or search for a location from the search bar and click on Set Alarm
Give a Name to the Alarm
You can set the Distance to alarm from the Settings
Do not close the app from the recents menu and keep GPS turned ON when an alarm is set.
To see the welcome slider again, click on help from the navigation drawer
Play alarm sound only on headphones when connected
